title: BONUS: Iman Shumpert Talks NBA Finals, New Podcast + Return to NBA
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
NBA player and personality Iman Shumpert sat down with Ebro in the Morning to discuss his time on Dancing With The Stars, and how his appearance made his mom super excited.

He also discussed the NBA Finals, and gives some insight on both the Boston Celtics and Golden State Warriors, the difference between players such as LeBron James and Kyrie Irving, the Los Angeles Lakers and more. His new podcast 'Iman Amongst Men' debuts June 23. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

description:
NBA player and personality Iman Shumpert sat down with Ebro in the Morning to discuss his time on Dancing With The Stars, and how his appearance made his mom super excited.

He also discussed the NBA Finals, and gives some insight on both the Boston Celtics and Golden State Warriors, the difference between players such as LeBron James and Kyrie Irving, the Los Angeles Lakers and more. His new podcast 'Iman Amongst Men' debuts June 23. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
